params.name: spectrogram_length
params.description: The time length of each audio spectrogram.

params.name: patch_size
params.description: The patch size of audio patch embedding.

params.name: feature_size
params.description: The frequency length of audio spectrogram.

params.name: sampling_rate
params.description: The sampling rate at which the audio files should be digitalized expressed in Hertz (Hz).

params.name: hop_length_to_sampling_rate
params.description: Hop length is length of the overlaping windows for the STFT used to obtain the Mel Frequency coefficients.For example, with sampling rate 44100, the hop length is 512, with 44100 / 512 = 86

params.name: padding_value
params.description: Padding value used to pad the audio. Should correspond to silences.
